CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: An alternating copolymer PSFDTBT of spirobifluorene and 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole unit was designed and synthesized.

Let's think step by step.

1. PSFDTBT: This is the name of the copolymer. It is composed of two monomers: Spirobifluorene and 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PSFDTBT (The synthesized copolymer)
2. Spirobifluorene
3. 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PSFDTBT (The synthesized copolymer)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: An alternating copolymer PSFDTBT of spirobifluorene and 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole unit was designed and synthesized.

Let's think step by step.

1. An alternating copolymer: This is a type of polymer where the monomers are arranged in an alternating sequence.
2. PSFDTBT: This is the name of the specific copolymer mentioned in the paragraph. It is an acronym for a type of copolymer made up of Spirobifluorene and 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole units.

So, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. An alternating copolymer
2. PSFDTBT
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.
1. PSFDTBT (This is the only entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to a material property, as it is the name of the specific copolymer being designed and synthesized.)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: An alternating copolymer PSFDTBT of spirobifluorene and 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole unit was designed and synthesized.

Let's think step by step.

1. An alternating copolymer: This is a type of polymer where the monomers are arranged in an alternating sequence. It is a compound or material.
2. PSFDTBT: This is the name of the specific copolymer mentioned in the paragraph. It is a property value, specifically the name of the copolymer.
3. of spirobifluorene and 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole unit: This describes the composition of the copolymer. Spirobifluorene and 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole are the monomers that make up the copolymer. They are property values, specifically the types of monomers used in the synthesis of the copolymer.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.
1. PSFDTBT: This is the name of the copolymer with the specific material property of being an alternating copolymer of spirobifluorene and 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole units.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT: an alternating copolymer of spirobifluorene and 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole units |
